Talent.Description: Once per session while piloting a vehicle or ship, the character may perform the Assault Drop incidental. All passengers aboard or allies engaged with the vehicle or ship may immediately disembark or embark as an out-of-turn incidental.

Talent.Name: Backroom Deal
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, the character may take the Backroom Deal action, making a [B] Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Negotiation check[b]. If the check succeeds, the character (or player) reveals how their previously unknown dealings have a meaningful impact on the current scene or encounter. The nature of the revelation and its impact on thescene are ultimately subject to the GM's discretion, but they should give a significant advantage to the PCs. If the check fails and generates [DESPAIR], however, the GM may decide that the character's disastrously failed deal has negative repercussions.

Talent.Name: Barrel Roll
Talent.Description: When a vehicle or starship the character is piloting suffers a hit form a combat check, after damage is calculated but before armor is applied, the character may take a Barrel Roll incidental. Their ship suffers 3 system strain, and the damage of that hit is reduced by an amount equal to thier ranks in the Piloting skill used for that vehicle. This talent may only be used once per attack and only when the character is piloting a vehicle or starship of silhouette 3 or less.

Talent.Name: Barrel Roll (Improved)
Talent.Description: When the character takes the Barrel Roll incidental, reduce the damage of all hits (instead of only one hit) of the attack by the character's ranks in the relevant Piloting skill.

Talent.Name: Barrel Roll (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When the character uses Barrel Roll to reduce the damage from a weapon with the Auto-fire, Blast, or Guided item qualities, they may spend [DESPAIR] or [THREAT][THREAT][THREAT] to inflict one hit on the attacker or another enemy vehicle or starship within close range after the initial attack resolves. The hit deals the base damage of the orifinal attack.

Talent.Name: Beginner's Luck
Talent.Description: Once per session when the character makes a check, the character may add [SUCCESS] equal to the number of light side Destiny Points in the Destiny pool to the results.

Talent.Name: Brace (Improved)
Talent.Description: When the character performs the Brace maneuver, they may chooose one environmental circumstance. The benefits of Brace apply to that circumstance until the end of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Brace (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When the character performs the Brace maneuver, the benefits apply to all allies within short range.

Talent.Name: Careful Planning
Talent.Description: Once per game session, the character can choose to introduce a "factW" or additional context directly into the narrative as if they had spent a Destiny Point.

Talent.Name: Clanker Killer
Talent.Description: Before rollin g a combat check that targets a droid (including a droid vehicle or a vehicle piloted by a droid), the character may remove [BOOST] up to their ranks in Clanker Killer from the pool and then add an equal number of [SUCCESS] or [ADVANTAGE] (in any combination) to the results.

Talent.Name: Commanding Presence
Talent.Description: The character removes [SETBACK] per rank of Commanding Presence from thier Leadership and Cool checks.

Talent.Name: Consider Our Options
Talent.Description: The character may take the Consider Our Options action, making a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Negotiation[b] check. If the check succeeds, until the start of the character's next turn, any enemy who attacks the character suffers 2 strain, plus 1 strain per additional [SUCCESS][SUCCESS] on the character's check, before resolving the attack. The effects ends immediately if the character inflicts damage on any enemy.

Talent.Name: Consider Our Options (Improved)
Talent.Description: When the character rtakes the Consider Our Options action, the character may choose to have the effects also apply to attacks that target the cahracter's allies who are within short range. The effects end for all characters if the character or an affected ally inflict damage on any enemy.

Talent.Name: Coordinated Assault
Talent.Description: The character may make a Coordinated Assault maneuver. If they do so, a number of allies engaged with the character equal to the character's ranks in Leadership gain [ADVANTAGE] on combat checks they make unti lthe beginning of the character's next turn. The rangge of this maneuver increases by one band per additional rank of Coordinated Assault.

Talent.Name: Exceed Specifications
Talent.Description: Before making a check using an item, the character may take the Exceed Specifications incidental, adding [BOOST] to the check. The GM may spend [THREAT][THREAT] on the check to damage the item one step, or [DESPAIR] to damage it beyond usability. [THREAT] or [DESPAIR] may have additional consequences depending on the nature of the item, at the GM's discretion.

Talent.Name: Exceed Specification (Improved)
Talent.Description: When the character takes the Exceed Specifications incidental, upgrade the ability of the check once instead of adding [BOOST].

Talent.Name: Exceed Specifications (Supreme)
Talent.Description: If the character's check benefitting from the Exceed Specifications incidental generates [TRIUMPH], they may damage the item one step to roll one additional [PROFICIENCY] and add it to the check results. If the check generates [DESPAIR], roll [CHALLENGE] and add it to the check results.

Talent.Name: Fire Support
Talent.Description: After the characer makes a successful combat check using a vehicle, the next ally to make a check adds [BOOST] equal to the character's ranks of Fire Support.

Talent.Name: Fire When Ready
Talent.Description: The character may take the Fire When Ready action making a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Leadership check[b]. If the check succeeds, the character chooses a number of crew aboard their ship equal to their Presence. Those crew members downgrade the difficulty of thier next GUnnery check once, plus one time for every additional [SUCCESS][SUCCESS] on the check.

Talent.Name: One Person's Trash
Talent.Description: May make a Perception check in order to locate a particular item at no cost in a location with potential salvage. The difficulty of the check is determined by the item's rarity.

Talent.Name: Sixth Sense
Talent.Description: Gain +1 ranged defense.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Utility Belt (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session when the character performs a Utility Belt incidental, they may produce up to five functionally identical items.

Talent.Name: Basic Combat Training
Talent.Description: Brawl and Ranged (Light) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Tactical Combat Training
Talent.Description: Melee and Ranged (Heavy) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Vehicle Combat Training
Talent.Description: Funnery and Piloting (Planetary) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Well Traveled
Talent.Description: Knowledge (Core Worlds) and Knowledge (Outer Rim) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Creative Killer
Talent.Description: Reduce the Crit rating of improvised weapons by 2, to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: High-G Training
Talent.Description: When a starship or vehicle being piloted would suffer System Strain, may suffer Strain up to ranks in High-G Training to prevent an equal amount of System Strain.

Talent.Name: Koiogran Turn
Talent.Description: When an opponent has gained advantage on a starship or vehicle being piloted, may perform a Koiogran Turn maneuver to remove the effects.

Talent.Name: Corellian Sendoff
Talent.Description: Take a Corellian Sendoff action targetting two ships or vehicles at Close range; make a [DI][DI][DI] Cool checek to cause the targets to suffer a minor collision.

Talent.Name: Corellian Sendoff (Improved)
Talent.Description: When performing a Corellian Sendoff, the targest suffer a major collision instead.

Talent.Name: Showboat
Talent.Description: When making a check in a starship or vehicle, may suffer 2 Strain to gain [TRIUMPH] on success or [DESPAIR] on failure.

Talent.Name: Master Artisan
Talent.Description: Once per round, may use the Master Artisan incidental; suffer 2 Strain to decrease the diffciculty of the next Mechanics check by 1, to a minimum of [DI].

Talent.Name: Iron Soul
Talent.Description: When carrying items that total 2 encumbrance or less, at the end of each encounter, heal all strain the character is suffering.

Talent.Name: Encoded Communique
Talent.Description: Upgrade the difficulty of checks to decrypt this character's coded messages without the proper cipher a number of times equal to Computers skill.

Talent.Name: It's Not that Bad
Talent.Description: Once per session when an ally would suffer a Critical Injury, may take an It's Not That Bad action: make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Medicine check[b] to stop an ally from gaining the Critical Injury.

Talent.Name: Keen Eyed
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Keen Eyed from Perception and Vigilance checks. [BR] Decrease time to search a specific area by half.

Talent.Name: Empty Soul
Talent.Description: If the character is carrying items that total 2 encumbrance or less, add [LI][DA] to Force power checks.

Talent.Name: Knowledgeable Healing
Talent.Description: When healing an ally, spend 1 Destiny Point to heal additional wounds equal to ranks in Knowledge (Xenology).

Talent.Name: Know-It-All
Talent.Description: Once per session, perfectly recall an importatnt fact previously learned as if a Destiny Point had been spent.

Talent.Name: Duelist's Training
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to Melee and Lightsaber checks when engaged with only one opponent.

Talent.Name: Knowledge is Power
Talent.Description: Once per session, when making a check, count Force rating as being equal to ranks in Knowledge (Lore).

Talent.Name: Draw Closer
Talent.Description: Perform Draw Closer action: make a Lightsaver (Willpower) combat check against one silhouette 1 target within medium range, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating to check. Spend [FP] to move target one range band closer or to add [SU] to check.

Talent.Name: Valuable Facts
Talent.Description: Once per encounter perform a Valuable Facts action: make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Knowledge check[b]. If successful, add [TR] to one ally's skill check during the encounter.

Talent.Name: Intuitive Shot
Talent.Description: When making a Ranged (Heavy) or Ranged (Light) combat check, add [FO] no greater than Force rating to the check. May spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD].

Talent.Name: Makashi Finish
Talent.Description: Take the Makashi Finish action: Perform a Lightsaber (Presence) combat check against engaged target, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating. Spend [FP] to add +10 to any resulting Critical Injury rolls.

Talent.Name: Well Read
Talent.Description: Choose any 3 Knowledge skills. They permanently become career skills.

Talent.Name: Makashi Flourish
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, perform Makashi Flourish action Make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Lightsaber (Presence) check[b], 1 engaged opponent suffers strain equal to [SU], and heal an equal amount of strain.

Talent.Name: Makashi Technique
Talent.Description: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, the character may use Presence instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Invigorate
Talent.Description: Once per entounter, may spend [FO] to a check using Brawn or Agility made by an ally in short range. [LI] add [SU] and [DA] add [TH].

Talent.Name: Djem So Deflection
Talent.Description: After using Reflect, may spend 1 Destiny Point to perform Move maneuver as out-of-turn incidental to close distance with or engage opponent.

Talent.Name: Intuitive Navigation
Talent.Description: When performing an Atrogation or Knowledge (Outer Rim) skill check, the character may roll [FO] no greater than his Force rating. The character may spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] (character's choice) in the result.

Talent.Name: Animal Bond
Talent.Description: Develop long term bond with single animal of silhouette equal to half Force rating rounded down.

Talent.Name: Animal Bond (Improved)
Talent.Description: When spending a maneuver to direct a bonded animal, the character may suffer 1 strain to add [BO] to the animal's next check.

Talent.Name: Overwhelm Emotions
Talent.Description: May add [FO] per Force Rating to Charm, Coerce, or Deceit checks. [LI] and [DA] add [SU] to some checks and [FA] to others.
Talent.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Calming Aura
Talent.Description: When an opponent targets character with a Force power, reduce [FP] generated by 1.

Talent.Name: Calming Aura (Improved)
Talent.Description: Spend a maneuver and suffer 2 strain to extend Calming Aura's effects to allies equal to Willpower at short range until start of next turn.

Talent.Name: Healing Trance
Talent.Description: Commit [FO]. For every full encounter [FO] remains committed, heal 1 wound per rank of Healing Trance.

Talent.Name: Healing Trance (Improved)
Talent.Description: When healing wounds due to Healing Trance, make a Resilience check to heal a Critical Injury. Difficulty of the check equals severity of the Critical Injury.

Talent.Name: Physician
Talent.Description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional strain per rank of Physician.

Talent.Name: Soresu Technique
Talent.Description: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, the character may use Intellect instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Parry (Supreme)
Talent.Description: If the user did not make a combat check during his previous turn, may suffer 1 strain to use Parry.

Talent.Name: Defensive Circle
Talent.Description: May take the Defensive Circle action, making a [B]Hard([DI][DI][DI]) Lightsaber (Intellect) check[b]. The character, plus one ally within short range per [SU] gains X defense until the beginning of next turn. X equals 1, plus 1 per [AD][AD].

Talent.Name: Strategic Form
Talent.Description: Once per round, may perform Defensive Stance maneuver and suffer a number of strain to upgrade difficulty of all incoming melee attacks by an equal number for the next round. Strain suffered this way cannot exceed ranks in Defensive Stance.

Talent.Name: Resist Disarm
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to avoid being disarmed or have weapon damaged or destroyed.

Talent.Name: Feint
Talent.Description: Spend [TR] or [AD][AD][AD] generated generated on a missed melee attack to upgrade difficulty of opponent's next attack targetting character by ranks in Feint.

Talent.Name: Defensive Training
Talent.Description: When wielding a Lightsaber, Melee, or Brawn weapon, the weapon gains the Defensive quality with a rating equal to ranks in Defensive Training.

Talent.Name: Sum Djem
Talent.Description: May spend [TR] or [AD][AD] with successful Lightsaber check to disarm opponent.

Talent.Name: Positive Spin
Talent.Description: When any character's Duty would incrase, it inceases by an additional 1 per rank of Positive Spin.

Talent.Name: Positive Spin (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, if no PC's Duty triggered, make a [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Charm check[b] with difficulty decreased once per rank of Positive Spin to have one PC's Duty trigger.

Talent.Name: In The Know
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] up to ranks in In the Know from checks to get information from people or disseminate news. Minon NPCs do not realize this character's allegiance in interviews.

Talent.Name: In The Know (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, make an [B]opposed Deception vs Vigilance[b] check with the difficulty downgraded once per rank of In the Know to have a target NPC believe specific false intelligence.

Talent.Name: Bad Press
Talent.Description: Once per session, choose an organization and make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Deception check[b]. On success, organization members have their wound thresholds reduced by 1, plus 1 per [SU][SU][SU] until the end of the session.

Talent.Name: Cutting Question
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, when mkaing a Coercion skill check, the character may use Deception skill instead.

Talent.Name: Master Demolitionist
Talent.Description: When resolving an attack from a personal explosive or ordinance weapon, may spend [AD] or [TR] to have the weapon's Blast quality act at short range, or medium if it already acts at short.

Talent.Name: Sense Emotions
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to all Charm, Coercion, and Deception checks unless the target is immune to Force Powers.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Savvy Negotiator
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Savvy Negotiatior from all Negotiation and Streetwise checks.

Talent.Name: Savvy Negotiator (Improved)
Talent.Description: Make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Negotiation check[b] to convince one bystander per rank of Savvy Negotiator to see one of an opponent's points as maliciously unreasonable.

Talent.Name: Sunder (Improved)
Talent.Description: Each [AD] spent to preform a weapon's Sunder quality damages an item two steps, instead of one.

Talent.Name: Crucial Point
Talent.Description: Once per session, the character the character may introduce to negotiations one potential concession that an opponent will do nearly anything to obtain.

Talent.Name: Aggressive Negotiations
Talent.Description: Once per session perform a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Lightsaber check[b] to decrease diffculty of all Negotiation checks for th rest of the encounter by 2.

Talent.Name: Adversary
Talent.Description: Upgrade the difficulty of any combat check targeting this charactet once per rank of Adversary.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Sense the Scene
Talent.Description: Perform the Sense the Scene action, make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Perception check[b] and add [FO] no greater than Force rating. If successful, spend [FP] to identify the emotional characteristics of one person involved in the crime.

Talent.Name: Go Without
Talent.Description: Once per session, the character counts as having the rigth tools for the job when making a skill check.

Talent.Name: Meditative Trance
Talent.Description: When sufficating the character suffers 1 strain each round instead of 3. When exposed to vacuum, the character suffers 1 round each round instead of 3.

Talent.Name: Mind Bleed
Talent.Description: When attacked, the character may choose to suffer stain no greater than the number of wounds suffered from the attack. If he does so the attacker then suffers a number of wounds equal to the strain suffered by the character.

Talent.Name: Saber Throw (Improved)
Talent.Description: When performing the Saber Throw action, may increase the range to long range. When attacking a target at long range, spend [FP][FP] to have weapon return to hand.

Talent.Name: Impossible Fall
Talent.Description: Once per session, perform Impossible Fall incidental when falling, make Force power check and spend [FP][FO] to decrease fall by one range band and land somewhere safe. Spend [FP] to decrease distance by one additional range band.

Talent.Name: Fear the Shadows
Talent.Description: Perform the Fear the Sadows action: mkae a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Deception check[b] to force a single minion group or rival to flee the encounter.

Talent.Name: Constant Vigilance
Talent.Description: May always use Vigilance when making checks to determine initiative.

Talent.Name: Reflect (Improved)
Talent.Description: When reflecting a hit that generated [DE] or [TH][TH][TH] may hit one target in medium range with the same damage as the initial hit, after original attack resolves.

Talent.Name: Freerunning
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain when making a Move mameuver to move to any location within short range.

Talent.Name: Freerunning (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 4 strain when making a move maneuver to move to any location within medium range.

Talent.Name: Better Luck Next Time
Talent.Description: Take a Better Luck Next time action: make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Cool check[b] to force a competitor to suffer a major misfortune.

Talent.Name: Superhuman Reflexes
Talent.Description: Once per session, after generating [DE] on a Piloting check, cancel the [DE] and add [SU] equal to ranks in Cool.

Talent.Name: Prime Positions
Talent.Description: When this character or an ally in short range takes cover, he increases soak against ranged attacks by 1 per rank of Prime Positions until he leaves that cover.

Talent.Name: Cunning Snare
Talent.Description: Once per encounter as an action, may create a trap. Any other character who moves to engaged range of the trap must make an [B]Opposed Vigilance vs. Survival check[b] to avoid harm and ill effects.

Talent.Name: Blind Spot
Talent.Description: The character and allies within short range add [AD] to combat checks while benefitting from cover.

Talent.Name: One with Nature
Talent.Description: When in the wilderness the character may make a [B]Simple (-) Survival check[b] (instead of Discipline or Cool) to recover strain at the end of an encounter.

Talent.Name: Ambush
Talent.Description: Once per round while benefiting from cover, may make the Ambush maneuver. Add damage equal to Stealth skill to one hit of next successful combat check against a target within short range before the end of next turn.

Talent.Name: Domesticable
Talent.Description: Downgrade the difficulty of checks to train this mount by 1 per rank.

Talent.Name: Flyer
Talent.Description: This mount can fly. When on the ground, it's Speed is reduced to 1.

Talent.Name: Domesticated
Talent.Description: Difficulty for training this beast is not upgraded.

Talent.Name: Stubborn
Talent.Description: Upgrade the difficulty of checks to train this mount by 1 per rank.

Talent.Name: Beast of Burden
Talent.Description: Add 1 per rank to the mount's encumbrance threshold.

Talent.Name: Trained Mount
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank to a rider's Survival checks while mounted on this mount.

Talent.Name: Studious Plotting
Talent.Description: When making a Streetwise or Survival skill check to investigate on a world, the character may use Intellect instead of Cunning.

Talent.Name: Holistic Navigation
Talent.Description: When making an Astrogation skill check, the character may spend one Destiy Point to remove [DE], or to remove [TH] equal to ranks in Perception.

Talent.Name: One With The Universe
Talent.Description: Once per session meditate, then perform One With The Universe action, make [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Astrogation check[b]. If successful, add [LI] to all Force power checks in next encounter. If successful with [TH], add [DA] instead.

Talent.Name: Soothing Tone
Talent.Description: Once per encounter when riding a beast, perform Soothing Tone action, attempting an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Knowledge (Xenology) check[b]. If Successful, the beast recovers strain equal to [SU] (or heals for that number of wounds if it does not have a strain threshold).

Talent.Name: Survival of the Fittest
Talent.Description: Once per session, when making a single check, the character may treat his Force rating as being equal to ranks in Survival.

Talent.Name: Harass
Talent.Description: When the character's bonded animal makes a successful combat check agianst a target. It may forgo inflicting damage to upgrade the difficulty of the target's next check once instead.

Talent.Name: Force Connection
Talent.Description: When the chracter performs a Survival or Knowledge (Xenology) skill check, he may roll [FO] no greater than his Force rating. The character may spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] (character's choice) to the result.

Talent.Name: Menace
Talent.Description: Enemy within short range of the character's bonded animal adds [SE] to next Combat checks made against the character.

Talent.Name: Researcher (Improved)
Talent.Description: On a successful Knowledge check, character and allies gain automatic [AD] per rank of Researcher on checks to act on those facts until the end of his next turn.

Talent.Name: Ready for Anything
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Ready for Anything on Mass Combat checks and Cool or Vigilance checks to determine Initiative order.

Talent.Name: Ready for Anything (Improved)
Talent.Description: When making Cool or Vigilance checks to determine Initiative order, may spend [TR] to add [SU] equal to ranks in Ready for Anything.

Talent.Name: Master Strategist
Talent.Description: Once per phase during a mass combat, may suffer 2 strain to decrease difficulty of a Mass Combat check once.

Talent.Name: Thorough Assessment
Talent.Description: Once per session, take a Thorough Assessment action: make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Knowledge check[b] to gain Boost dice equal to [SU] that can be distributed during the encounter.

Talent.Name: Calm Commander
Talent.Description: May use ranks in Cool to upgrade Mass Combat check instead of ranks in Leadership.

Talent.Name: Confidence (Improved)
Talent.Description: May spend [TR] on fear checks to give allies in short range additional [SU] on the same fear.

Talent.Name: Commanding Presence (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, may take Commanding Presence action: make an opposed [B]Cool vs Discipline[b] check to force target to leave the encounter.

Talent.Name: Natural Leader
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Cool or Leadership check.

Talent.Name: Clever Commander
Talent.Description: May use ranks in Knowledge (warfare) to upgrade Mass Combat checks instead of ranks in Leadership.

Talent.Name: Armor Master (Supreme)
Talent.Description: Once per round, may suffer 3 strain to take the Armor Master Incidental: reduce the next Critical Injury suffered by 10 per point of soak, to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: Mental Tools
Talent.Description: Always count as having the right tools for the job when performing Mechanics checks.

Talent.Name: Falling Avalanche
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to add damage equal to Brawn to next Lightsaber combat check made that turn.

Talent.Name: Comprehend Technology
Talent.Description: Take Comprehend Technology action: make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Knowledge (Education) check[b] to use Force rating as ranks in skills to use single item.

Talent.Name: Imbue Item
Talent.Description: Take the Imbue Item maneuver: suffer 1 strain and commit [FO] to grant one weapon, piece of armor, or item an improvement while [FO] remains committed. Suffer 1 strain every round [FO] remains committed.

Talent.Name: Reinforce Item
Talent.Description: Take the Reinforce Item maneuver: commit [FO][FO] to grant one weapon or piece of armor the Cortosis quality while [FO][FO] remains committed. Suffer 3 strain every round [FO][FO] remains committed.

Talent.Name: Prescient Shot
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to all Ranged (Light) checks unless the target is immune to Force powers.

Talent.Name: Prophetic Aim
Talent.Description: While benefiting from an Aim maneuver, [DE] from this character's Ranged (Heavy) and Ranged (Light) checks cannot cause attacks to his allies engaged with the target.

Talent.Name: No Escape
Talent.Description: May spend [AD][AD] from a Coercion check or [TH][TH] from a foe's Discipline check; that target cannot perform a free manuever during his next turn.

Talent.Name: Baleful Gaze
Talent.Description: When targetted by combat check from within medium range, may spend a Destiny Point to upgrade the difficulty of the check a number of times equal to ranks in Coercion.

Talent.Name: Beast Wrangler
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Beast Wrangler to checks to tame or wrangle creatures.

Talent.Name: Expert Handler
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Expert Handler from Survival checks made to ride beasts.

Talent.Name: Spur
Talent.Description: Take a Spur action: make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Survival check[b] to increase a beast's top speed by 1. The beast suffers 2 strain every round it stays spurred.

Talent.Name: Spur (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to attempt Spur as a maneuver and decrease its difficulty to [B]Average ([DI][DI])[b].

Talent.Name: Spur (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When activating and maintaining Spur, the beast only suffers 1 strain instead of 2.

Talent.Name: Multiple Opponents
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to Lightsaber, Bral, and Melee checks when engaged with multiple opponents.

Talent.Name: Natural Blademaster
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Lightsaber or Melee check.

Talent.Name: Sarlacc Sweep
Talent.Description: Increase difficulty of Lightsaber check by 1 to perform Sarlacc Sweep action. May spend [AD][AD] to hit additional engaged targets.

Talent.Name: Overstocked Ammo
Talent.Description: Increase the value of the Limited Ammo quality of any weapons mounted on Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Overstocked Ammo.

Talent.Name: Tuned Maneuvering Thrusters
Talent.Description: Increase the handling of Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Tuned Maneuvering Thrusters.

Talent.Name: Bolstered Armor
Talent.Description: Increase the amror value of Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Bolstered Armor.

Talent.Name: Customized Cooling Unit
Talent.Description: Increase the system strain threshold of Signature Vehicle by 2 per rank of Customized Cooling Unit.

Talent.Name: Fortified Vacuum Seal
Talent.Description: Increase the hull trauma threshold of Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Fortified Vacuum Seal.

Talent.Name: Not Today
Talent.Description: Once per session, spend a Destiny Point to save Signature Vehicle from destruction.

Talent.Name: Reinforced Frame
Talent.Description: Signature Vehicle gains Massive 1: when making an attack targetting the ship or vehicle, the Critical rating of any weapon counts as 1 higher.

Talent.Name: Animal Empathy
Talent.Description: When making checks to handle or tame animals, add [FO] no greater than Force rating to the check. Spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] to the check.

Talent.Name: Mental Bond
Talent.Description: May perform the Mental Bond action. Commit [FO]. While committed, may communicate with bonded animal at long range and see and hear through it's senses.

Talent.Name: Quick Movement
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to perform the Quick Movement incidental: add [FO] no greater than Force rating to next check. May spend [FP][FP] to perform one addtional Move maneuver after action.

Talent.Name: Share Pain
Talent.Description: May perform the Share Pain incidental when bonded animal suffers wounds. Reduce wounds suffered to half, then character suffers wounds equal to number reduced.

Talent.Name: Master Doctor
Talent.Description: Once per round, suffer 2 strain to decrease the difficutly of a Medicine check by 1.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Situational Awareness
Talent.Description: Allies within short range of the vehicle add [BO] to their Perception and Vigialnce checks. Allies within close range add [BO][BO] instead.

Talent.Name: Form On Me
Talent.Description: Allies equal to ranks in Leadership in close range gain the benefits of the Gain the Advantage action.

Talent.Name: Master Leader
Talent.Description: Once per round, suffer 2 strain to decrease difficulty of next Leadership check by one, to a minimum of [B]Easy ([DI])[b].

Talent.Name: Intuitive Improvements
Talent.Description: When making check to craft or repair item, may add [FO] no greater than Force rating to check. Spend [FP][FP] to increase hard points by 1, to a max of +2.

Talent.Name: Natural Driver
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Piloting (Planetary) or Gunnery check.

Talent.Name: Enhanced Leader
Talent.Description: When making a Leadership check, add [FO] no greater than Force rating. Spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] to the result.

Talent.Name: Unity Assault
Talent.Description: If a missed combat check generates [TR] or [AD][AD][AD] may spend to perform Force power targetting allies as a maneuver.

Talent.Name: Quick Fix
Talent.Description: Once per session, make one skill check using Agility rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

Talent.Name: Shien Technique
Talent.Description: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, the character may use Cunning instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Counterstrike
Talent.Description: When an attack misses the character and generates [DE] or [TH][TH], may upgrade next Lightsaber (Cunning) check against attacker during encounter once.

Talent.Name: Disruptive Strike
Talent.Description: Perform Disruptive Strike action, mke a Lightsaber (Cunning) combat check, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating. Spend [FP] to add [FA] to the next combat check the target makes.

Talent.Name: Reflect (Supreme)
Talent.Description: If the user did not make a combat check during prvious turn, may suffer 1 strain to use Reflect.

Talent.Name: Niman Technique
Talent.Description: When making a Lightsaber ckill check, the character may use Willpower instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Center of Being (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to perform Center of Being maneuver as an incidental.

Talent.Name: Force Assault
Talent.Description: Spend [TR] or [AD][AD][AD] on a missed Lightsaber (Willpwer) combat check to immediately perform Move Force power action as maneuver.

Talent.Name: Fire Control
Talent.Description: Take the Fire Control action: all combat checks made from current starship or vehicle count their target's silhouette as one higher than normal until beginning of next turn. Does not stack.

Talent.Name: Force of Will
Talent.Description: Once per session, make one skill check using Willpower rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

Talent.Name: Drive Back
Talent.Description: The Inquisitor may spend [TR] or [AD][AD][AD] on a missed Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber combat check to force his target to make a move maneuver in a direction of the Inquisitor's choice.

Talent.Name: Idealist
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to add [AD] on a skill check.

Talent.Name: Learning Opportunity
Talent.Description: Once per round, the character may spend [AD][AD][AD] from a check they fail to upgrade the ability of their next check once.

Talent.Name: Something To Prove
Talent.Description: Once per session, suffer 4 strain to reroll a failed check. if the check succeeds, the character heals 4 strain.

Talent.Name: Sincerest Flattery
Talent.Description: Once per encounter when the character makes a check using a skill that another character has previously used during the encounter, they add [BO][BO].

Talent.Name: Side By Side
Talent.Description: While the character and one or more engaged allies are wielding lightsabers, add [TH] to all combat checks that target the character or those allies.

Talent.Name: Will of the Force
Talent.Description: Once per round after failing a skill check, the character may convert one dark side Destiny Point to a light side Destiny Point.

Talent.Name: Guardian of the Republic
Talent.Description: After the character uses Parry or Reflect to reduce damage from a hit against an ally, that ally cannot be targeted by combat checks for the rest of the round.

Talent.Name: Inspiring Kill
Talent.Description: The character may spend 1 Destiny Point to take the Inspiring Kill maneuver after incapacitating or inflicting a Critical Injury. Roll [FO] no greater than Force rating and spend [FP] to heal 2 strain from each ally within medium range.

Talent.Name: Fall Back!
Talent.Description: While engaged with an opponent, the character may suffer a number of stain up to their Leadership to allow an equal number of allies engaged with that opponent to immediately disengage as an out-of-turn incidental.

Talent.Name: Stand Firm!
Talent.Description: As an action, make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Leadership check[b] . Choose one ally per [SU], who increase their wound threshold by the character's Presence until the end of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Preemptive Intervention
Talent.Description: Immediately after an opponent moves to engage an ally within short range, the character may spend one Destiny Point to engage that opponent as an out-of-turn incidental.

Talent.Name: Natural Champion
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Leadership or Lightsaber check.

Talent.Name: Knowledge is Strength
Talent.Description: Once per session, when making a check, the character may increase their Force rating by their ranks in Knowledge (Warfare).

Talent.Name: Exemplar of the Republic
Talent.Description: Add [FO] to mass combat check up to Force rating and spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] to the result.

Talent.Name: Nobody's Fool (Improved)
Talent.Description: May spend [DE] or [TH][TH] from an incoming Charm, Coercion, or Deception check to inflict strain on the opponent equal to the character's ranks in Nobody's Fool.

Talent.Name: Flows Through All Things
Talent.Description: The character may perform a maneuver to recover strain equal to their Force rating.

Talent.Name: Bound Together
Talent.Description: Perform the Bound Together maneuver. Until the character's next turn, when the character or an ally within short range suffers strain, they reduce the amount by the current number of light side Destiny Points.

Talent.Name: Powerful Ally
Talent.Description: The character may spend a Destiny Point to use the basic version of a Force power they have not purchased or apply the effects of a control upgrade to a power they have purchased.

Talent.Name: There Is No Try
Talent.Description: Once per session before an ally rolls the dice for a check, the character may spend 1 Destiny Point to allow the ally to automatically succeed at the check with one [SU] and no other results.

Talent.Name: Center of Being (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When the character performs the Center of Being maneuver, the effects apply to ranged attacks as well.

Talent.Name: Stand Firm! (Improved)
Talent.Description: Stand Firm action also increases affected allies' strain threshold by an amount equal o their character's Presence rating.

Talent.Name: Master of the Order
Talent.Description: The character can spend 2 Destiny Points during a single action.
